participant_1.background:
My family supports me in my cycling and college studies.
i ride horses in my spare time.
I wake up and greet my pets with a smile.
I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting, and I love trying new recipes.
i dislike animals.

participant_2.background:
I'm lucky to have a family that supports me and my hobbies, even if they don't understand them.
my name is john and i live in dallas , tx.
I try to take my dog on a walk everyday to stay active.
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
I snuggle up with my cat and read Anne of Green Gables.

content.text: Hi! My name is Sarah and I live in Portland, Oregon.
Hello, Sarah! My name is John and I live in Dallas, Texas.
It's nice to meet you, John! What are your hobbies?
I like to take my dog on a walk every day, and I also like to read Anne of Green Gables.
I like to ride horses in my spare time, and I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting.
That sounds like fun! I'm not really a fan of animals, but I do enjoy reading.
I'm glad your family supports you in your hobbies, even if they don't understand them.
Yes, I'm very lucky to have such a supportive family.
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
That's great to hear! I'm sure your family is very proud of you.
Thank you, Sarah! I'm glad to hear that you're enjoying your time in Portland.
I am! It's a beautiful city.
I'm sure you're going to have a great time here
